WorkItem.Description:
When putting a craft in a custom orbit the common procedure calls for the end user to:

* start the game
* load a craft and put it on the pad
* close the game
* edit the orbit

With the current tools we have eliminated the need for a user to manually edit the file. 

Add capabilities to import a .craft file directly into a game save by performing the same processing steps handled by KSP when putting a craft on the pad (mainly adding orbit nodes and setting up relationships using the additional craft file meta-data) 

Support Import/Export of Craft and Vessels
* Input > Output
* Craft > Vessel
* Vessel > Craft

Comments.Message:
After taking a close look at a craft file and it's version loaded in save data I have determined the basic strategy used by the game to construct a VESSEL object. However it is going to take some time to test each part type to discover all the types of auto-generated modules that are added when the vessel is created. 

Further I need to better understand the association between certain key values like attN and how to calculate them in  a VESSEL. 

As to not delay the upcoming release which already has a lot of changes this task will be pushed to an upcoming release.
